titles.title: Power And Security Systems (PASS) Act
Power And Security Systems (PASS) Act
Power And Security Systems (PASS) Act
Power And Security Systems (PASS) Act

A bill to provide for consideration of the extension under the Energy Policy and Conservation Act of nonapplication of No-Load Mode energy efficiency standards to certain security or life safety alarms or surveillance systems, and for other purposes.
Power And Security Systems (PASS) Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Murkowski without amendment. With written report No. 115-76.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 95.
